body:
Emeraldsword (and maybe other mods too) can you please not lock my threads like 1 min after I make them?? Maybe I still have questions!! Can you even give me a chance to express my opinion??
PLEASE stop being so biased. 
If you keep locking threads like this I WILL report this to a manager +.

title: Locking Threads
